name: WordCloud
short: Per-user and guild wordclouds with emoji support
author: Elvin
description: Tracks words, Unicode emojis, custom Discord emojis and reactions per-user and per-guild and generates transparent PNG wordclouds.
install_msg: Requires Python packages: wordcloud, pillow, regex, aiosqlite. Install them in Red's environment ('pip install wordcloud pillow regex aiosqlite aiohttp').
